meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being opposite or contrary.
meanings.sent1: The opposabilities of the magnets made them repel each other.
meanings.sent2: The opposabilities of the colors on the color wheel create harmony in art.
meanings.sent3: The opposabilities of the siblings always led to playful arguments.
meanings.sent4: The opposabilities of their personalities clashed like thunder and lightning.
meanings.sent5: The opposabilities of fire and water symbolize the eternal struggle of nature.

meanings.definition: The ability to be in opposition or contrast.
meanings.sent1: The opposabilities of their opinions sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent2: The opposabilities of light and dark add depth to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The opposabilities of the flavors in the dish surprised and delighted the guests.
meanings.sent4: The opposabilities of tradition and innovation shaped the company's direction.
meanings.sent5: The opposabilities of the two teams made the game intense and exciting.
